revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - Make relevant changes and rename this to sb;3;6030 presenting the text of SB.

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. Lin2--> συγγενεῖ; lin3--> στρατη3.- γῶ; not worth retaining the BL citation as such, since it only indicates reedition; lin4--> πορθώτου=SB 3.6030 (BL 2.1.13)|ed; lin5--> γραμματεῖ; lin6--> τοπογραμμα6.- τεῖ; lin7--> πεντήκοντα=SB 3.6030 (BL 2.1.13)|ed; lin10--> ἑκεκαγίως:>=SB 3.6030 (BL 2.1.13)|ed|ἑκεσαγίως:>. These changes at least should be incorporated. But there are other differences between SB and O.Joach. (e.g. Μενάνδρου lin7, <Καλλίου> Πορεμβήκιος lin6) and perhaps the O.Joach. text should be utterly deprecated and replaced with the SB text. But if so, that should be done separate editorial intervention after this one is complete.
batch converted all tei:sic to tei:orig and tei:corr to tei:reg
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; changed sic to surplus; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
